none: 山形県遠賀神社の算額 (復元)・Sangaku of Onga Shrine, Yamagata (Replica)

遠賀神社様には、算額の撮影および掲載の許可を賜り、感謝申し上げます。協力：斎藤久勝様 パブリックドメイン：https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/deed.ja・We would like to thank Oga Shrine for their kind permission to photograph the sangaku and post it in the archive. Many thanks to Hisakatsu Saito for facilitating. Public Domain: https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0
山形県鶴岡市遠賀原8・8 Ongahara, Tsuruoka City, Yamagata Prefecture
中村八郎兵衛政栄・Nakamura Hachirobei Masae
